name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LinkedIn Integration for Less Annoying CRM

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync LinkedIn contacts to Less Annoying CRM with 1 click. Save 4hrs / week doing CRM data entry.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkLess lets you fetch a LinkedIn user's contact information and add to your Less Annoying CRM account with 1 click.

With 1 click you'll get the LinkedIn user's:

- First & last name
- Job title
- Company
- Email
- Phone number (if available)
- Country
- And much more

Here's how to get started:

1. Install the LinkLess Chrome Extension
2. Go to a LinkedIn profile and click the "Add to Less Annoying CRM" button
3. You'll now see all their contact info
4. Click 'Add to CRM' to add them as a lead in your CRM

There's no need to do manual data entry anymore - you can now create leads directly from within the LinkedIn website.

Save 4hrs / week on CRM data entry ðŸ’ª

This app is not affiliated with LinkedIn or Less Annoying CRM.
